name: Sportovka Basic Tonic Massage Solution 200 ml
descr:
Intended primarily for short massage and self-massage, to purify and regenerate the skin all over the body and face.
 
Sportovka is a moderne massage and restorative product intended for short massage and self-massages for athletes and regular consumers. The balanced content of ethanol, glycerin, flavouring compositions, functional materials and water help to achieve optimum skin condition and increase resistance to microbiological agents.
 
Dermatologicaly tested. Effect on the skin: Neutral pH-value.
 
Also available in 1000 ml version.
